text.quote: 1: Clause 1, page 1, line 4, leave out subsection (2)
2: Clause 1, page 1, line 8, leave out from first “persons” to “and” on line 9, and insert “whose travel on official business has the approval of Her Majesty the Queen,”
4: Clause 1, page 1, leave out lines 12 and 13
5: Clause 1, page 1, leave out lines 14 and 15
6: Clause 1, page 1, leave out lines 16 to 18
7: Clause 2, page 2, line 1, leave out subsection (2)
8: Clause 2, page 2, line 5, leave out subsections (3) and (4)
9: Clause 2, page 2, line 8, leave out subsection (4)
000: Clause 3, the above-named Lords give notice of their intention to oppose the Question that Clause 3 stand part of the Bill.
10: Clause 4, page 2, line 18, leave out subsections (2) and (3)
11: Clause 4, page 2, line 22, leave out subsection (4)
